mapper.select: select m.MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NICK, MEM_NM, MEM_TEL, MEM_MAIL, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADDR, MEM_ADDR2, MEM_JOIN_DT, MEM_BIRTH, ENABLED, MBS_CD, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_AUTH_CD from MEMBER m, MEM_AUTH ma where m.MEM_NO = ma.MEM_NO and m.ENABLED = '1' and MEM_ID = #{memId}
